# axis

**Instance Property**

Part of the correction for astigmatism that measures the orientation fo the correction.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var axis: HKQuantity? { get }
```

## Discussion

This quantity measures the orientation of the correction in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit/degreeAngle()] units.

## Accessing lens specification data

- **sphere**: The correction for farsightedness.
- **cylinder**: Part of the correction for astigmatism that measures the strength of the correction.
- **addPower**: The correction for nearsightedness.
